distribution_strategy: The document will be divided among 4 SubMasters, each with a distinct role focusing on extracting key findings and methodologies as per the user's notes. SubMaster 1 will focus on the foundational aspects (Abstract and Introduction) for initial summarization. SubMaster 2 will delve into the core Methodology and Experiments, crucial for understanding how the research was conducted. SubMaster 3 will analyze the Results and Discussion to extract key findings and their implications. SubMaster 4 will be responsible for entity extraction across the entire document, ensuring all relevant entities are captured, and will also handle the Conclusion and Appendix for completeness.

submasters.role: Summarize Abstract and Introduction to set the context.
Identify key findings from Results and Discussion.
Extract entities and keywords, and summarize Conclusion/Appendix.
